LanguageData.BiosculpterPleasure.stages.biosculpter_p: Every part of me is somehow better at feeling good.
LanguageData.ConnectedTreeDied.stages.Gauranlen_death: My tree... its calming presence became pure pain, then went silent. Its suffering echoes in my mind...
LanguageData.DryadDied.stages.dryad_died.label: dryad died
LanguageData.DryadDied.stages.dryad_died.description: My tree's dryad is gone forever. You shall be missed, little one.
LanguageData.RelicsCollected.stages.all_relics_collec: We found all of our sacred relics!
LanguageData.SleptInRoomWithSlave.stages.shared_room_: I had to sleep in the same room as a slave.
LanguageData.WasEnslaved.stages.was_enslaved.label: was enslaved
LanguageData.WasEnslaved.stages.was_enslaved.descript: They kept me as a slave. They forced me to suffer!
